Uses of Class
harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib.TGameResultCode

    • Uses of TGameResultCode in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib

      Methods in harrygpotter.tombola.tombolalib that return TGameResultCode 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      TGameResultCode TGame.assign()
      After each number extraction, if TGame.setConfirmCandidateOn(boolean) is set to true, you need to call this method to assign award to candidate cards.
      TGameResultCode TGame.extractNumber()
      This method acts just like TGame.extractNumber(int) but does not require the extracted number as external input, providing automatically to extract a random number that has not already been extracted before.
      TGameResultCode TGame.extractNumber​(int number)
      You can consider this method as the "prince" of all TGame methods! It executes all the logic and controls to simulate and manage the consequences of the extraction of a number during a tombola game. It requires as an external input the number to be extracted (of course, it must be a valid number that has not been already extracted before) and checks all cards participating to the game against the available awards to verify if...
      TGameResultCode TGame.getLastResultCode()
      Return the resultCode reached by the last call to TGame.extractNumber(), TGame.extractNumber(int), TGame.resolveCandidates(int), TGame.resolveCandidates(int[]) or TGame.rollback() methods.
      TGameResultCode TGame.resolveCandidates​(int winnerPos)
      This method is a syntactic sugar method and acts just like TGame.resolveCandidates(int[]), but allows to specify just a single, unique winner card for the first award that is in "CONTENDING" status. See the cited companion method for further details.
      TGameResultCode TGame.resolveCandidates​(int[] winnerIndexes)
      When, after the extraction of a number, more than one card reach the score to be appointed to an available award, the game "pauses", enters the "RESOLVING" status and requires that someone, from the external, make a choice and resolves the conflicts. This method helps to manage this very common situation, letting the user to adopt whatever criteria she/he wants to take the choice and thus communicating it to the TGame object by means of this method.
      TGameResultCode TGame.rollback()
      This method, as you can imagine, allows the rollback of the last extracted number during a tombola game. Perhaps it requires to be checked, tested and fixed a bit...
      static TGameResultCode TGameResultCode.valueOf​(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static TGameResultCode[] TGameResultCode.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
